query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZUSERF( MANDT , USERAUT1 , USERAUT2 , USERAUT3 , USERAUT4 , USERAUT5 -- , USERBACK , USERCODE , USERTEAM , USERCODE_R , USERCODE_B , USERCODE_M , USERCODE_E , USERDESC , USEREXPR , USERFAIL -- , USERJUNO , USERLANG -- , USERLGIP -- , USERLGTM , USERMAIL , USERMBPN , USERNAME , USERNUMB , USERPASS , USERTELE , USERLLVL , USERBIRTH , ERDAT -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.12.02 Han J.H , ERZEIT -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.12.02 Han J.H ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #USERAUT1# , #USERAUT2# , #USERAUT3# , #USERAUT4# , #USERAUT5# -- , #USERBACK# , #USERCODE# , #USERTEAM# , #USERCODE# , #USERCODE# , #USERCODE# , #USERCODE# , #USERDESC# , #USEREXPR# , 0 -- , #USERJUNO# , #USERLANG# -- , #USERLGIP# -- , #USERLGTM# , #USERMAIL# , #USERMBPN# , #USERNAME# , ( SELECT CASE WHEN USERNUMB = '' THEN ( CASE WHEN REGDPT = 'R' THEN (SELECT MAX(USERNUMB)+1 FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB LIKE '80%') WHEN REGDPT = 'B' THEN (SELECT MAX(USERNUMB)+1 FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB LIKE '900%') ELSE (SELECT MAX(USERNUMB)+1 FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB LIKE '70%') END ) ELSE USERNUMB END FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF_REQ WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNAME = #USERNAME# AND USERMAIL = #USERMAIL# AND SEQ_NO = #SEQ_NO# ) , 'INIT1234' , #USERTELE# , 3 , #USERBIRTH# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) )
